resources.string: The tweet text is too long.
We recommend to add more than 20 tweets to your tweet list.\nTwitter does not allow to tweet the same content in a short period.
Add more tweets to tweet list
Do you want to delete this tweet?
Login to your Twitter account of your Bot.
TwiBotMaker will pick a random tweet from Tweet List and tweet it.

Unable to connect to the specified Spreadsheet. 

- Check your internet connection 

 - Make sure the URL is correct 

 - Your google account should have a permission to write/read the spreadsheet 

 - To restore, the name of the sheet should be the same as your BOT's twitter username (after @ symbol).
The Backup button make the sheet automatically.
Sync your tweet list with Google Spreadsheet!\nSignin with your Google Account.
Enter the URL of the Spreadsheet you want to sync.
Backup your tweet list to google spreadsheet
Restore your backup from Google Spreadsheet
